mapper.select: SELECT corperration_no as corperrationNo, corperration_name as corperrationName, corperration_date as corperrationDate, corperration_price as corperrationPrice, corperration_bigo as corperrationBigo FROM corperration3 LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT corperration_no as corperrationNo, corperration_place as corperrationPlace, corperration_name as corperrationName, corperration_date as corperrationDate, corperration_price as corperrationPrice FROM corperration2 LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT corperration_no as corperrationNo, corperration_place as corperrationPlace, corperration_name as corperrationName, corperration_date as corperrationDate, corperration_price as corperrationPrice FROM corperration LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
